DOC.brief_summary: The study enrolles all consecutive patients undergoing cardiac surgery at the European Hospital, Rome. The population undergoes randomization to receive usual surgical hemostasis or added topical application of Omni-stat Celox. The two populations are followed up prospectively as regarding blood loss and need for blood transfusions, as well as adverse events at 30 days after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Blood Sparing Strategies: Omni-stat Routinary Use in Cardiac Surgery. A Prospective Randomized Study.
DOC.keyword: Ability of topical drug to reduce acute and overall bleeding as well as blood transfusions
